hadiths.text: Abu Ad-Darda narrated:"I performed eleven prostrations (of recitation) with the Messenger of Allah, among them was that which is in Surat An-Najm

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي سُجُودِ الْقُرْآنِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Locations In The Qur'an Where One Is To Prostrate
